subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1688 is out for delivery
description_text:
Dear, I am glad to say I have received the package, *sadly*,* the haptic
reactors are not in the package* . Please let me know what you intend to do
with that.

conversations.body_text:
Dear, I am glad to say I have received the package, *sadly*,* the haptic
reactors are not in the package*, *Also the extra sprungs and elastometters
were not received in the package * . Please let me know what you intend to
do with that.

I would like to mention that also the heel plate is missing in that
package. so in total the thing that are missing:
VAM Pro haptic reactor x 3
VAM PRO power supply
Sprung × 1 Red
Sprung × 1 Blue
Sprung × 1 Yellow
Elastomer × 1 White
Heel plate for the Heightening plate.

It's quite disappointing. Please
Hi avi peretz,  Please don’t worry—it’s possible that the items were shipped separately. We will check your order status right away and get back to you as soon as possible.

Hi avi peretz,  You're located in Israel, correct? It seems a ceasefire agreement was signed yesterday. We checked with the logistics providers yesterday, and shipping services have not yet fully resumed. As soon as they do, we will immediately ship out the products that are still pending delivery.
Hi avi peretz,    We need to confirm that the product you received does not contain Heel plate, please provide us a picture. We will ship it for you next Monday, thanks for your understanding.

Dear,
Thank you for your consideration and service. heel [plate is indeed
missing. here some pictures from unboxing and after assembly:
[image: WhatsApp Image 2025-06-26 at 11.26.36 AM.jpeg][image: WhatsApp
Image 2025-06-26 at 11.25.22 AM.jpeg][image: WhatsApp Image 2025-06-27 at
2.55.31 PM.jpeg]
[image: WhatsApp Image 2025-06-27 at 2.54.22 PM.jpeg]


On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 1:40 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi avi peretz,    This is Heel Plate. Regarding the motor, we are contacting more logistics providers for viable shipping options. One is currently available to ship, but the price is unacceptable to us and we will wait for an update from him.

Hi,
Thanks for the update! Is it possible to ship all the missing items in one
package? If so, what is the estimated delivery date? I would love to check
and enjoy your product as soon as possible, the delay is understandable but
should be limited :)
Otherwise, you may consider a refund, which is less preferable for me.

Thank you,
-- 
*Avi Peretz*
Software Developer
(mobile) +972-50-3433997 || (mail) Avishai651@gmail.com
Hi avi peretz,    We have been keeping an eye on the logistics and should be able to ship your order in the next couple of days, thank you for your patience.
